mapper.select: select user_id from subscribe where room_id = #{roomId} and user_id = #{userId} union all select 0 as coin from dual limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into message ( user_id, room_id, content, date) values ( #{userId}, #{roomId}, #{content}, #{date} )
mapper.select: select message_id, user_id, room_id, content, date, user_name from message join user_tb on message.user_id = user_tb.id where room_id = #{roomId} and date > (select date from subscribe where room_id = #{roomId} and user_id = #{userId})
